30ab0e2cf45737503962934a66546708e757da28.summary: Fix Linux `move_to_trash` wrongly reporting files as not found
30ab0e2cf45737503962934a66546708e757da28.body:
We can't rely on the error code from `gio` or `kioclient5`, in my
rudimentary testing they return `1` for both missing files and other
situations like not having a Trash can on the mounted volume.

Fixes #79108.

(cherry picked from commit a6e75f397127c9a1a99aed7ae41ea22e34d91a08)

a6e75f397127c9a1a99aed7ae41ea22e34d91a08.summary: Fix Linux `move_to_trash` wrongly reporting files as not found
a6e75f397127c9a1a99aed7ae41ea22e34d91a08.body:
We can't rely on the error code from `gio` or `kioclient5`, in my
rudimentary testing they return `1` for both missing files and other
situations like not having a Trash can on the mounted volume.

Fixes #79108.

2f32a3454ce6d493eb6f6b8fa08be9e3170271a2.summary: Fix `Camera2D.rotating` not being converted and reversed properly
2f32a3454ce6d493eb6f6b8fa08be9e3170271a2.body:
Godot 3's Camera2D `rotating = true` and `rotating = false` are supposed to be converted and reversed to `ignore_rotation = false` and `ignore_rotation = true` respectively, but this wasn't the case before this PR, as the project converted was failing to properly read the `true` and `false` strings, thus resulting in `ignore_rotation = true` in all cases.

(cherry picked from commit 256b99ca40dda4b187dadea8302ca3578281af85)

256b99ca40dda4b187dadea8302ca3578281af85.summary: Fix `Camera2D.rotating` not being converted and reversed properly
256b99ca40dda4b187dadea8302ca3578281af85.body: Godot 3's Camera2D `rotating = true` and `rotating = false` are supposed to be converted and reversed to `ignore_rotation = false` and `ignore_rotation = true` respectively, but this wasn't the case before this PR, as the project converted was failing to properly read the `true` and `false` strings, thus resulting in `ignore_rotation = true` in all cases.
